User’s Guide

UserGuide.Rmd

Jean-Philippe Villemin1, Simon Cabello-Aguilar1, Jacques Colinge1

1 Institut de Recherche en Cancérologie de Montpellier, Inserm, Montpellier, France ; Institut régional du Cancer Montpellier, Montpellier, France ; Université de Montpellier, Montpellier, France

Introduction

This guide provides an overview of the BulkSignalR package, a comprehensive framework to obtain cellular network maps from bulk RNA-seq data.

library(BulkSignalR)
data(sdc, package = "BulkSignalR")
head(sdc)

Quick Start

Autre test…

plot(1)         # high-level plot
abline(0, 1)    # low-level change

plot(rnorm(10)) # high-level plot
